sentences.en: Alkalosis and potassium depletion may be pronounced.
Dehydration -- An abnormal depletion of water and other body fluids.
sentences.cn: 脱水 — 水分和其它体液的非正常流失.

sentences.en: Depletion of soil nitrogen frequently leads to reduced concentrations of soluble amino and amides.
sentences.cn: 土壤氮素的减少常常导致可溶性氨基酸和酰胺浓度的降低.

sentences.en: Farmers should rotate crops every season to prevent depletion of the soil.
sentences.cn: 农夫每季应该要轮耕,以免耗尽土壤.

sentences.en: Gas cap field are usually developed by natural depletion and water flooding.
sentences.cn: 国内外对于气顶油田的开发主要是采用衰竭式和注水开发方式.

sentences.en: Increased consumption of water has led to rapid depletion of groundwater reserves.
sentences.cn: 用水量的增加导致了地下水贮备迅速枯竭.

sentences.en: Like hydration, the final effects of fluid and salt depletion depend on the volume of fluid.
sentences.cn: 象水合作用一样, 水和盐分耗竭的最终效应,也是根据液体的容积而定的.

sentences.en: Man – made CFCs are the main cause of ozone depletion in the stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 人造氯氟烃是臭氧层破坏的主因.

sentences.en: Nitrogen oxides releases directly by supersonic aircraft into the stratosphere contribute directly to the depletion of the ozone layer.
sentences.cn: 由超音速飞机直接排放到平流层中的氧化氮会直接导致臭氧的消耗。

sentences.en: Overfishing not only causes depletion in individual fish stocks, but also disruption to entire ecosystems and food webs in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 过度捕捞不仅引起个别鱼种的消耗，而且还引起海洋中整个生态系统和食物网的崩溃。

sentences.en: Pollution leads to depletion of ozone layer, global warming and climate change.
sentences.cn: 污染导致臭氧层耗竭, 全球变暖和气候变化.

sentences.en: The Attentional Blink: Temporary Control, Delayed Selection or Resource Depletion?
sentences.cn: 注意瞬脱: 短暂失控 、 延迟选择还是资源耗竭?

sentences.en: The development of leucocyte depletion filter is rapid with a prosperous application.
sentences.cn: 提高血小板回收率的白细胞过滤器具有广阔的应用前景.

sentences.en: The influence of light stabilizer depletion in the agricultural film processing on product quantity is analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析光稳定剂在农膜生产过程中的消耗对产品质量的影响。

sentences.en: They are caused by the depletion of ATP ( adenosine triphosphate ).
sentences.cn: 这是由于ATP ( 三磷酸盐腺 ) 耗尽造成的.

sentences.en: This decreases the device thickness and depletion voltage and consequently reduces material quality requirements and cost of the detector material.
sentences.cn: 这减少了设备的厚度和电压损耗，从而降低材料的质量要求和探测器的材料成本。

sentences.en: This modest amount of sodium bicarbonate prevents the potassium depletion and demineralization of bone.
sentences.cn: 这点碳酸氢钠量即可防止缺钾和骨质脱钙.

sentences.en: What can we do to effectively curb the depletion of layer?
sentences.cn: 我们如何能有效地抑制臭氧层的变薄?

sentences.en: What they find could provide clues to what might happen worldwide if ozone depletion continues.
sentences.cn: 他们的发现可以揭示如果臭氧持续减少，世界范围内可能会出现什么情况。

words.tran_cn: 使减少；弄空；耗尽…的资源（deplete的过去分词）
耗尽，用尽；使衰竭，使空虚
